title: The Diversity Kittens: Meltingpot Mountain
description: Join the Diversity Kittens as they show you what inclusion and equity can really achieve.
quote: Itâ€™s more fun to play with a ball of yarn if it has all the colors in it. And yarn should be allowed to marry dental floss.
